page.syntax: Value_Written as N = poke(N position,N Value)

argument.name: position
argument.description: The position to write the data.

page.description: Set the value of a byte of the blob.
page.discussion: The .POKE() method sets a byte at Position in a blob to a Value. The first position is 1.The .POKE() method does not change the size of the blob. Use the <BLOB>.RESIZE() method to change the size of a blob.
